item.title: Writing on the Walls
item.description: [[songs/s/slipknot/all_hope_is_gone/gehenna.md#free-my-severed-heart-give-me-you-i-want-it-vyl-wnanory|Maybe we, why don’t we]] [[songs/s/slipknot/all_hope_is_gone/gehenna.md#free-my-severed-heart-give-me-you-i-want-it-vyl-wnanory|Sit right here for half an hour?]] [[songs/s/slipknot/all_hope_is_gone/gehenna.md#free-my-severed-heart-give-me-you-i-want-it-vyl-wnanory|We’ll speak of what a waste I am]] [[songs/s/slipknot/all_hope_is_gone/gehenna.
